name: Gameloft Game Data File
summary: Learn about .BDAE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Sometimes players alter game content by swapping BDAE files so that weapons or visual effects are changed in the game.

description: Data file used by Gameloft mobile games such as Modern Combat 2: Black Pegasus and Gangstar: West Coast Hustle; contains game data such as weapon and visual effects information.
